text: @NYGovCuomo You sent the poor covid19 who tested positive straight to Nursing Homes to spread and kill other Seniors, and you have the gall to post this about your Nursing Homes ?It  wasn the care they did not get at the Home it was the Governor who sent no PPE,who sent covid-19 into the NH
